roleset.name: greater than
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

frameset.note: I don't know how ok it is to have a symbol as a lemma, but this will be realized slightly differently from 'greater' because it will always include both sides of the equation (2 args), and never just a single arg. If we do decide to alias this to 'great', arg2->CXN.
